name: The Original Liverpol Sound.
description:
L to R: Vasily Petrenko, Principal Conductor with Liverpool Phil musicians; Simon Cowen, tenor trombone; Concettina Del Vecchio, violin; Rachael Pankhurst, cor anglais; Graham Johns, percussion; Jonathan Aasgaard, cello; Robin Haggart, tuba photographed on New Brighton promenade.


A professionally printed archive quality photographic print printed on A3 paper.  The final print will have a narrow white border to enable window mounting.  As standard the print has a matt surface which will show off the print better when framed behind glass.

All prints are sent out directly, by the printers, in secure packaging.
UK postage includes recorded delivery.

For any other enquiries regards different sizes, mounting, surfaces, signed prints or other personal requests please get in touch via the contact page of this site.

Click the image to view larger.

Thanks

Mark McNulty.

description:
